source: van de Plassche et al., Phys. Plasmas 27, 022310 (2020)
description: Published accuracy figures for the QLKNN-10D neural network surrogate trained on ~300M QuaLiKiz v2.4.0 calculations.
notes: These are the target benchmarks. Our surrogate should achieve RMSE% within 2x of these published values.

efi_GB.notes: Dominant transport channel for ITG-driven turbulence

efe_GB.notes: Dominant transport channel for TEM/ETG-driven turbulence

pfe_GB.notes: Hardest channel to predict due to sign changes and turbulent pinch effects

training_details.speedup: 3-5 orders of magnitude faster than full QuaLiKiz
